title: Myth: The Fallen Lords Review
description:
Myth the Fallen Lords sends you and the forces of Light on a marathon to the east in a last ditch effort to save the last free city and stop the Dark in a blaze of tactical action. But what lies beneath?
Support the channel at: https://www.patreon.com/mandaloregaming or https://www.paypal.me/mandaloregaming
Thumbnail art and additional art by @sneksucks
I take video suggestions at mandaloremovies@gmail.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Lord_Mandalore
00:00 - Intro
01:16 - Issues & Fixes
03:14 - Game Premise
5:50 - Visuals
8:18 - Music & Sound Design
13:06 - Gameplay Mechanics
16:04 - The Campaign
30:49 - Conclusions
31:33 - Credits
32:56 - DeVoid

#myth #gaming #bungie
